TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Guanshan, title = Guanshan, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Guanshan} }

S.FORM: guansan cen(binununan:Kinalaungan；nginaingayngan:guanˊ sanˊ ziinˋ；pinairangan:Koan-san-tìn),izua sicuayan a ngadan lilung ,imaza i pasaviri a taituking, izua tu alu kuzulj a caucau, avan nu tjaljakedrian ta cen kata neka paselaw ta ita kudraw a caucau nua i taiwan. pakata ljaqedi ta zuma qinaljan. pasamaza ledepan kicencen ta haydan, a i viri kicaing tua i cesan, a i tjaikacedas mavan a dunghe, a i navalj kicaing tua i luye. pazumamaw za imaza i pasanavalj a kalingu kata valangaw sevesevec a lizulizuk, izua binan pana cemalivat, itua i vecekadan gadugaduan kata a ljavyljaving a mareka gadugaduan a dideq, a kalevelevan semezan tu kemaledeledev. a iciningkan a sikudjaljan 200mm, a ljemita qadaw nicu kimaya 23.7 ℃ a sezaman. cinalivatan ka cinting a djiday, pinpu zuku guci guci goo guci guci a la la(avan za dawulung zuku) naljitalatj a sema guansan a qemumang. au aza amizuku namatevelj kata lenindjelj ta qinaljan imaza tauta. aza pairang ka uri puaming nanga cinting kuangshu a djiday patagilj a semamaza qemuma. ka ripun a djiday, aza haka zuku kemavacuk tua i pasakacedasan vunglin a kadjunangan, au zuma malje zuma caucau na sepulingetj i guansan kata pasakacedas a kadjunangan. guansan cen kasicuayan a aza kuming sihu guan guan ta lemindjelj la au zuma caucau bien rico jaja ngadan lilung (pinairangan:Lí-lāng), kemasi 'inamizukuan patagilj, a siaya liaw qudjidjilj a qatjuvitjuvi a imi. ka 1920 a cavilj, linindjelj ta lilung ciyican , au semandjalan pakata kisac uri na pazangal a sisazuan nua kacalisian, ulja i teku ta daguan gadu, avanzua pavalitan ta ngadan ti "guansan" aya. ka 1946 a cavilj, aza kuming sihu lemindjelj ta guansan guan, au pavalitan ta lilung cen, ka 1954 a cavilj, mumaljeng a pavalitan ta guansan cen. kamakama paljavak tua kadjunangan izua pitju a ri kata itaiday sa tjelu puluq sa lima a rin i guansan cen. pakata kadjunangan izua binan pana pakamaza seqaljudj, aicu i kacedasan kata viri a ljavek a gadugaduan kata a gadugaduan i vecekadan tua taiwan, aza masan tjakedri a kadjunangan avan za taitu sevesevec a lizulizuk. imaza a kadjunangan mamaw ta cesan kata luye guan a maruqalu a kinadjunangan, lja mavatj aicu a kadjunangan au maqati a mirazek ta nguiu. ljakua za i guansan tjateku a kinamamamavan tua vavavan nua gadu tua i cesan. saka tja saljeneng tauta. guansan a sikac aicu "sinivarung pakata pasakacedas a kadjunangan", guansan sinan vecekadan ca guansan a sikace. a na mabugay paljeqaca ma guansan, cesan kata haydan aicu tjelu a qinaljan, tucu aza sincen kikang avan za i guansan a sinan vecekadan, a ikiw kadjunangan izuanan luye kata yenpin aicu drusa a guan. aza guansan hasisiw, guansan sapuycy, guansan a kivecikan ta kukumibu, izuanan guansan cecy biuing, saka tjalja nangawaqan tjakaizuanan pakata kakipucemelan. pakata kinapangaljan a paljavak a rikishi ka 1915 a cavilj lilung patagilj avan nu vecekadan nua guansan sincen a kadjunangan , seman ta ljingas pakata kisac uri na pazangal a sisazuan nua kacalisian, au linindjelj ta "lilung citing". ka 1920 a cavilj lilung citing tinevelj i taituciting. ka 1923 a cavilj, linindjelj mumalj ta citing, masan kanri a luye, lilung kata sinkaiyan aicu tjelu a kadjunangan, ka 1937 a cavilj, lilung citing pavalitan ta guansandjin, lilungzuang pavalitan ta guansanzuang, aicu guansanzuang izua tucu i cesan, guansan, haydan, luye kata yenpin a lima a sincen a kadjunangan, saka guansan avan nu vececadan a lima sincen sikace a hici. kapuaming ta maqaqeci i 1946 a cavilj ita qiljas drusa puluq sa lima a qadaw, avan nu taituking guansan ci guansan guan, au izua tjelu a qinaljan sipavecik paguansan guan, guansan, cesan kata luye guan. mamaw a cavilj tu sepatj qiljas, aza sikan cen pavalitan ta lilung cen, aicu guansan ci a kinanri mapazulju tu drusa a qinaljan, penuljat ita cen kata sepatj a qinaljan. ka 1947 a cavilj sualapen ta guansan cisu , ka 1949 a cavilj linindjelj ta dungvungcy , aicu cisu a umaq i lilung cen avan nu sicuayan a kakaizuanan a guansan cisu. za kanriven italatj izua a haydan, djisan, yenpin, daren kata lanyu aicu lima a qinaljan. lilung mumalj masan ta vecekadan nua mareka kadjunangan pakata kinapangaljan a paljavak. ka 1951 a cavilj, sualapen ta dungvungcy, aza sincen a manguwqen amin i lilung cen italadj. ka 1949 a cavilj lilung cen pavalitan a ngadan ta guansan cen patjelja tucu. lilung imaza tjalja mirazek ka ripun a djiday, lja imaza avan nu vecekadan nua sincen kata hasisiw, aza kinsac, kumuing kata tacekeljan niamadju sinan pazangal mirazek ta siubay, bunka kata kakituluwan, saka lilung masan ta sikace i pasanavalj a kalingu kata valangaw sevesevec a lizulizuk. pakata nasidjaravacan, izua disiaba a kisiya kata disiaba a basu, namasan pazangal aravac a kadjunangan sema i kacalisian a qinaljan. pakata sengesengan, ka ripun a djiday, izua seman alju, seman hutaring, kafi kata qadupu a sengesengan, kapuaming ta maqaqeci, izua qemuma, kasiw, qadupu kata kusui a sengesengan. saka tjaljiazua ta caucau patjavat semamaza. aicu guansan hici i vecekadan nua yili kata valangaw a dideq. saka a tjeketjek na masansika drusamuluq a djalanan i taiwan, kata cenkung dideq izua ljavek a gadugaduan a qecen, saka maqati kitjuaya pakata kadjunangan nimadju. caucau pakata caucau i guansan cen, ka 1968 a cavilj tjatjuruvuan, au nutjaivililj mekedri, amin ka 1975, 1981, 1982, 1990 kata 1993 aicu lima a cavilj na mapazulju, a tjeza anga sepatj puluq sa pitju a cavilj mekedrikedri sakamaya, ka 2007 a cavilj tapuluq qiljas patagilj a mekedri mata ita kudraw teku a caucau. nasidjaravacan sinupuan kivangvangan racev

goansan cen(binononan:Kinalaongan；nginaingayngan:goanˊ sanˊ ziinˋ；pinairangan:Koan-san-tìn),izoa sicoayan a ngadan lilong ,imaza i pasaviri a taitoking, izoa to alo kozolj a caocao, avan no tjaljakedrian ta cen kata neka paselaw ta ita kodraw a caocao noa i taiwan. pakata ljaqedi ta zoma qinaljan. pasamaza ledepan kicencen ta haydan, a i viri kicaing toa i cesan, a i tjaikacedas mavan a donghe, a i navalj kicaing toa i loye. pazomamaw za imaza i pasanavalj a kalingo kata valangaw sevesevec a lizolizok, izoa binan pana cemalivat, itoa i vecekadan gadogadoan kata a ljavyljaving a mareka gadogadoan a dideq, a kalevelevan semezan to kemaledeledev. a iciningkan a sikodjaljan 200mm, a ljemita qadaw nico kimaya 23.7 ℃ a sezaman. cinalivatan ka cinting a djiday, pinpo zoko goci goci goo goci goci a la la(avan za dawolong zoko) naljitalatj a sema goansan a qemomang. ao aza amizoko namatevelj kata lenindjelj ta qinaljan imaza taota. aza pairang ka ori poaming nanga cinting koangsho a djiday patagilj a semamaza qemoma. ka ripon a djiday, aza haka zoko kemavacok toa i pasakacedasan vonglin a kadjonangan, ao zoma malje zoma caocao na sepolingetj i goansan kata pasakacedas a kadjonangan. goansan cen kasicoayan a aza koming siho goan goan ta lemindjelj la ao zoma caocao bien rico jaja ngadan lilong (pinairangan:Lí-lāng), kemasi 'inamizokoan patagilj, a siaya liaw qodjidjilj a qatjovitjovi a imi. ka 1920 a cavilj, linindjelj ta lilong ciyican , ao semandjalan pakata kisac ori na pazangal a sisazoan noa kacalisian, olja i teko ta dagoan gado, avanzoa pavalitan ta ngadan ti "goansan" aya. ka 1946 a cavilj, aza koming siho lemindjelj ta goansan goan, ao pavalitan ta lilong cen, ka 1954 a cavilj, momaljeng a pavalitan ta goansan cen. kamakama paljavak toa kadjonangan izoa pitjo a ri kata itaiday sa tjelo poloq sa lima a rin i goansan cen. pakata kadjonangan izoa binan pana pakamaza seqaljodj, aico i kacedasan kata viri a ljavek a gadogadoan kata a gadogadoan i vecekadan toa taiwan, aza masan tjakedri a kadjonangan avan za taito sevesevec a lizolizok. imaza a kadjonangan mamaw ta cesan kata loye goan a maroqalo a kinadjonangan, lja mavatj aico a kadjonangan ao maqati a mirazek ta ngoio. ljakoa za i goansan tjateko a kinamamamavan toa vavavan noa gado toa i cesan. saka tja saljeneng taota. goansan a sikac aico "sinivarong pakata pasakacedas a kadjonangan", goansan sinan vecekadan ca goansan a sikace. a na mabogay paljeqaca ma goansan, cesan kata haydan aico tjelo a qinaljan, toco aza sincen kikang avan za i goansan a sinan vecekadan, a ikiw kadjonangan izoanan loye kata yenpin aico drosa a goan. aza goansan hasisiw, goansan sapoycy, goansan a kivecikan ta kokomibo, izoanan goansan cecy bioing, saka tjalja nangawaqan tjakaizoanan pakata kakipocemelan. pakata kinapangaljan a paljavak a rikishi ka 1915 a cavilj lilong patagilj avan no vecekadan noa goansan sincen a kadjonangan , seman ta ljingas pakata kisac ori na pazangal a sisazoan noa kacalisian, ao linindjelj ta "lilong citing". ka 1920 a cavilj lilong citing tinevelj i taitociting. ka 1923 a cavilj, linindjelj momalj ta citing, masan kanri a loye, lilong kata sinkaiyan aico tjelo a kadjonangan, ka 1937 a cavilj, lilong citing pavalitan ta goansandjin, lilongzoang pavalitan ta goansanzoang, aico goansanzoang izoa toco i cesan, goansan, haydan, loye kata yenpin a lima a sincen a kadjonangan, saka goansan avan no vececadan a lima sincen sikace a hici. kapoaming ta maqaqeci i 1946 a cavilj ita qiljas drosa poloq sa lima a qadaw, avan no taitoking goansan ci goansan goan, ao izoa tjelo a qinaljan sipavecik pagoansan goan, goansan, cesan kata loye goan. mamaw a cavilj to sepatj qiljas, aza sikan cen pavalitan ta lilong cen, aico goansan ci a kinanri mapazoljo to drosa a qinaljan, penoljat ita cen kata sepatj a qinaljan. ka 1947 a cavilj soalapen ta goansan ciso , ka 1949 a cavilj linindjelj ta dongvongcy , aico ciso a omaq i lilong cen avan no sicoayan a kakaizoanan a goansan ciso. za kanriven italatj izoa a haydan, djisan, yenpin, daren kata lanyo aico lima a qinaljan. lilong momalj masan ta vecekadan noa mareka kadjonangan pakata kinapangaljan a paljavak. ka 1951 a cavilj, soalapen ta dongvongcy, aza sincen a mangowqen amin i lilong cen italadj. ka 1949 a cavilj lilong cen pavalitan a ngadan ta goansan cen patjelja toco. lilong imaza tjalja mirazek ka ripon a djiday, lja imaza avan no vecekadan noa sincen kata hasisiw, aza kinsac, komoing kata tacekeljan niamadjo sinan pazangal mirazek ta siobay, bonka kata kakitolowan, saka lilong masan ta sikace i pasanavalj a kalingo kata valangaw sevesevec a lizolizok. pakata nasidjaravacan, izoa disiaba a kisiya kata disiaba a baso, namasan pazangal aravac a kadjonangan sema i kacalisian a qinaljan. pakata sengesengan, ka ripon a djiday, izoa seman aljo, seman hotaring, kafi kata qadopo a sengesengan, kapoaming ta maqaqeci, izoa qemoma, kasiw, qadopo kata kosoi a sengesengan. saka tjaljiazoa ta caocao patjavat semamaza. aico goansan hici i vecekadan noa yili kata valangaw a dideq. saka a tjeketjek na masansika drosamoloq a djalanan i taiwan, kata cenkong dideq izoa ljavek a gadogadoan a qecen, saka maqati kitjoaya pakata kadjonangan nimadjo. caocao pakata caocao i goansan cen, ka 1968 a cavilj tjatjorovoan, ao notjaivililj mekedri, amin ka 1975, 1981, 1982, 1990 kata 1993 aico lima a cavilj na mapazoljo, a tjeza anga sepatj poloq sa pitjo a cavilj mekedrikedri sakamaya, ka 2007 a cavilj tapoloq qiljas patagilj a mekedri mata ita kodraw teko a caocao. nasidjaravacan sinopoan kivangvangan racev
